snippet: A majority of voters seem willing to accept spending cuts and tax hikes if pensions, education and other areas remain untouched.

byline.original: By JENS HAINMUELLER and YOTAM MARGALIT

lead_paragraph: A majority of voters seem willing to accept spending cuts and tax hikes if pensions, education and other areas remain untouched.

headline.print_headline: Many Greeks Still Want a Deal
headline.main: Many Greeks Still Want a Deal
